original_title: Water Cut for Colombo & suburbs tomorrow (25)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A 10-hour water cut will be in effect for Colombo and its suburbs on Saturday (25), said the National Water Supply and Drainage Board.
Accordingly, the water cut will be in effect from 11 AM to 9 PM on Saturday (25).
Colombo, Dehiwala, Mount Lavinia, Kotte, and Kaduwela Municipal Council Areas
